mapper.insert: insert into orderitem(orderId, id, postCode, address1, address2, address3, orderPrice, charge) values(#{orderId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{id}, #{postCode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{orderPrice}, #{charge})

select nvl(max(oino), 0) + 1 from orderdetail
INSERT ALL
into orderdetail(oino, orderId, ino, id, price, amount) values (#{oino} + #{index}, #{item.orderId}, #{item.ino}, #{item.id}, #{item.price}, #{item.amount})
